rukus.text: inkara karanara evum na vicare ke te'o bhagi nikalase, kharekhara te'o lacara nathi kari sakata

tame temani sathe yud'dha mate potani sakti pramane taiyari karo ane ghoda'one pana taiyara rakho, jethi tame tena vade allahana ane potana satru'one bhayabhita kari sako ane temana sivaya bija lokone pana, jemane tame nathi janata, allaha ta'ala te'one khuba sari rite jane che, je kami pana allahana margamam kharca karaso, te tamane purepurum apavamam avase ane tamaro adhikara chinavi levamam nahim ave
jo te'o samadhana tarapha jhuki jaya to, tame pana samadhana karava mate jhuki java ane allaha para bharoso rakho, ni:Sanka te ghano ja sambhalanara, jananara che
Jo te loko tamari sathe dago karava icchase to, allaha tamara mate purato che, tene ja potani madada vade ane imanavala'ona sahakarathi tamari madada kari che

temana hrdayomam mohabbata pana tene ja bhari che, dharatimam je kami pana che te badhum ja jo tame kharca kari deta to pana te'ona hrdayone melavi na sakata. A to allaha'e ja te'omam mohabbata nakhi, te vijayi, hikamatavalo che
he payagambara! Tamara mate allaha purato che ane te imanavala'o mate je tamarum anusarana kari rahya che
